name: By The Second
description:
Extra Credits Game Jam 2018 Submission - Awesome Per Second!

Art by @blushybirb

Writing, Coding, and Sound by @chromelette

This game uses these sounds from freesound:

Applause 2.WAV by Sandermotions
Laughing_Audience by unchaz
Carabiner Attach to Harness by Kinoton
Gunshot 4.wav by ShawnyBoy
Trigger with hammer fall.wav by Nanashi
Clean Revolver Reload by Dredile
Fleshy Impale Bone Break with Gut Dropping.wav by UOregonCinemaStudies
Body_impact_wood.aiff by MaxDemianAGL
Up Chime 1 by FoolBoyMedia
Hand Winch Quick Release.wav by Benboncan
buzzer.wav by Philip_Daniels
Hang Man's Rope by jergonda

"Happy Happy Game Show"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
